itunes:title: MAY 19 2022 — JANKOWICZ OUT AT DHS, LORENZ BLAMES POSO
title: MAY 19 2022 — JANKOWICZ OUT AT DHS, LORENZ BLAMES POSO
description:
The Biden Administration’s “Ministry of Truth’ is put on pause, and Nina Jankowicz has resigned from the disinformation board, updates from day 2 of the Michael Sussmann trial, a leaked memo reveals that DHS is preparing for violence after abortion ruling, and a study from Claremont Graduate University finds that testosterone treatment turns liberal voters more conservative.

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use promo code POSO 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO


TPUSA’s Student Action Summit will be in Tampa, FL from July 22-24 in Tampa, FL !! To register and receive 25% your ticket use code POSO https://www.tpusa.com/SAS
